SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT A.FormID ,A.FormName ,A.IsUse ,A.FormDesc ,A.RegDate AS RegDate ,A.FileName ,A.Revision ,A.SchemaID ,A.SortKey ,A.BodyType ,A.FormPrefix ,B.SchemaName ,A.FormID AS FORM_KEY ,C.FormClassID ,C.FormClassName ,A.CompanyCode ,A.EntCode ,IF(A.AclAllYN ='Y', covi_smart4j.fn_entname_s(CompanyCode), covi_smart4j.fn_entname_s(Left((SELECT CONCAT(';',GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CompanyCode) SEPARATOR ';')) FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_forms_acl WHERE ObjectType ='FORM' AND TargetID = A.FormID ), 100)) )AS EntName
,CSTF.IsFree ,CSTF.Price
FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Forms A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_FormsSchema B ON A.SchemaID = B.SchemaID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_FormClass C ON A.FormClassID = C.FormClassID
INNER JOIN ( SELECT si.IsFree, si.Price, sf.StoredFormID FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_store_forms sf JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_store_items si on sf.StoreItemID = si.StoreItemID ) CSTF on A.StoredFormID = CSTF.StoredFormID
AND A.IsUse = #{IsUse}
AND A.CompanyCode = #{EntCode}
) A
AND
FormPrefix FormClassName FormName
LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{search},'(%|\'|\")','\\\\\\1'),'%')
AND ( FormPrefix LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{icoSearch},'(%|\'|\")','\\\\\\1'),'%') OR FormClassName LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{icoSearch},'(%|\'|\")','\\\\\\1'),'%') OR FormName LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{icoSearch},'(%|\'|\")','\\\\\\1'),'%') )
FormClassName FormName FormPrefix Revision SchemaName SortKey EntName RegDate IsFree IsUse
ASC DESC
IsUse DESC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}

SELECT GroupID AS GR_ID ,GroupCode AS GR_Code ,CompanyCode AS DN_Code ,GroupType ,GroupPath ,DisplayName ,SortKey ,SortPath ,IsUse ,IsDisplay FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group WHERE GroupType in ('Region') AND IsUse = 'Y' AND IsDisplay = 'Y'
AND CompanyCode IN
#{item}
ORDER BY SortPath asc

SELECT FormID ,FormClassID ,SchemaID ,IsUse ,Revision ,SortKey ,FormName ,FormPrefix ,FormDesc ,FileName ,BodyDefault ,if(AclAllYN ='Y', IF(#{isSaaS}='Y', CompanyCode, 'WF'), (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CompanyCode) SEPARATOR ';') FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_forms_acl WHERE ObjectType ='FORM' AND TargetID = FormID) ) AS EntCode ,ExtInfo ,AutoApprovalLine ,BodyType ,SubTableInfo ,RegID ,RegDate ,ModID ,ModDate ,FormHelperContext ,FormNoticeContext ,Reserved1 ,Reserved2 ,Reserved3 ,Reserved4 ,Reserved5 ,CompanyCode FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_forms WHERE FormID = #{FormID}
mapper.update: UPDATE covi_approval4j.jwf_process AS P JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_forminstance AS FI ON P.FormInstID = FI.FormInstID SET ProcessState = 545 ,DeleteDate = now(3) WHERE FI.FormID = #{FormID};
UPDATE covi_approval4j.jwf_process AS P JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.jwf_forminstance AS FI ON P.FormInstID = FI.FormInstID SET DeleteDate = now(3) WHERE FI.FormID = #{FormID};

UPDATE covi_approval4j.jwf_workitem AS W JOIN ( SELECT P.ProcessID FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_process AS P JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.jwf_forminstance AS FI ON P.FormInstID = FI.FormInstID WHERE FI.FormID = #{FormID} ) X ON W.ProcessID =X.ProcessID SET PIDeleted = now(3)
mapper.delete: DELETE H FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_formhistory AS H JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_forminstance AS FI ON H.FormInstID = FI.FormInstID WHERE FI.FormID = #{FormID};

SELECT 'group' AS itemType ,gr.GroupID ,gr.MultiDisplayName AS DN ,cn.MultiDisplayName AS ETNM ,gr.CompanyCode ,gr.GroupCode ,gr.GroupType FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group AS gr LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group AS cn ON gr.CompanyCode = cn.GroupCode AND cn.GroupType = 'Company' INNER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_forms_acl jfa ON gr.GroupCode = jfa.GroupCode AND gr.GroupType = jfa.GroupType AND jfa.ObjectType = 'FORM' WHERE 1=1 AND gr.IsUse = 'Y' AND gr.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND gr.GroupType IN ('Dept','Company') AND jfa.TargetID = #{FormID}
